Tender Announcement for Cryogenic Probe Station
==============================================

### Contract Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3773861970-DOC3898119532
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3773861970
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-20
* **Closing Date**: 2023-05-19T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-05-09

### Contract Description

The Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics Research Centre (HAA), located in Victoria, British Columbia, is seeking a cryogenic RF probe station designed to operate up to 67 GHz. The selected equipment will be used to develop high-sensitivity and low-noise devices and their modeling for radio astronomy instrumentation.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

The selected supplier will be required to deliver the equipment to the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
